thread.title: MediSpend Welcomes Jim Despelteau as Chief Technology Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: MediSpend Welcomes Jim Despelteau as Chief Technology Officer
text:
PORTSMOUTH, N.H., March 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- MediSpend welcomes Jim Despelteau as Chief Technology Officer to its executive leadership team. The addition of Despelteau further positions MediSpend to continue its robust growth trajectory and leadership position in the healthcare compliance market . As life sciences companies continue to move compliance systems to the cloud, a strong bench of experienced technology professionals ensures the company can deliver best in class software solutions to the global life sciences market.
"We are excited to expand and deepen the breadth of expertise of the MediSpend leadership team," said Michaeline Daboul, president, CEO and co-founder of MediSpend. "Jim's R&D experience across multiple industry domains and technological disciplines, including healthcare information technology systems, analytics, and cloud hosted SaaS distribution will help solidify our leadership position."
A veteran of the tech industry with more than 30 years of experience, Despelteau has held positions as Senior Vice President, Engineering and Chief Technology Officer at companies including Verisk Health and most recently Qcentive LLC. "I am grateful for the opportunity to share my leadership experience and technological insights as a member of the executive team," said Despelteau. "MediSpend's commitment to technological R&D is proof of their commitment to maintaining their position as a leader in the compliance industry."
About MediSpend
MediSpend is the global leader in cloud-based compliance software for the life science industry. The MediSpend Compliance Cloud enables companies to manage and monitor physician engagement and aggregate and analyze enterprise data. As the compliance system of record for many, MediSpend helps pharmaceutical and medical device companies meet the standards of global data privacy and transparency regulations with ease. It ensures compliance with global healthcare laws while reducing risk and lowering costs. MediSpend is headquartered in Portsmouth, NH, with offices in Minnesota, New York and Pennsylvania. For more information please visit, www.medispend.com .
